name: Database-2-Java-Services (D2JS)
short_description: Just point to your database, run it and see your Service-oriented DAOLayer created automatically in under 5 secs. Perform all the CRUD operations with lightening speed in transactional service-oriented fashion. Re-run any time to sync DB changes.
